name: Zoomies!
overview: An underwater shoot 'em up by Second Dimension. A fun little game in which traversing the deep ocean floor, you must wipe out everything in your way such as Jellyfish, Sea Horses, Sharks and anything else that's usually found down in the depths of the ocean. A fun little shoot 'em up game which looks to have been inspired by Mastertronic's Sub Hunt. Full source code is available.
